20101219152231.000|20101219152232.429|CCO|           PRISTIQ IS
20101219152232.429|20101219152233.857|CCO|    A PRESCRIPTION MEDICINE
20101219152233.857|20101219152235.286|CCO|  PROVEN TO TREAT DEPRESSION.
20101219152235.286|20101219152236.714|CCO|   PRISTIQ IS THOUGHT TO WORK
20101219152236.714|20101219152238.143|CCO|    BY AFFECTING THE LEVELS
20101219152238.143|20101219152239.571|CCO| OF TWO CHEMICALS IN THE BRAIN,
20101219152239.571|20101219152241.000|CCO| SEROTONIN AND NOREPINEPHRINE.
20101219152241.000|20101219152242.111|CCO|  TELL YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY
20101219152242.111|20101219152243.222|CCO|  IF YOUR DEPRESSION WORSENS
20101219152243.222|20101219152244.333|CCO|  OR YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES
20101219152244.333|20101219152245.444|CCO|       IN MOOD, BEHAVIOR,
20101219152245.444|20101219152246.556|CCO|    OR THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE.
20101219152246.556|20101219152247.667|CCO|  ANTIDEPRESSANTS CAN INCREASE
20101219152247.667|20101219152248.778|CCO|       SUICIDAL THOUGHTS
20101219152248.778|20101219152249.889|CCO|   AND BEHAVIORS IN CHILDREN,
20101219152249.889|20101219152251.000|CCO|    TEENS AND YOUNG ADULTS.
20101219152251.000|20101219152252.429|CCO|    PRISTIQ IS NOT APPROVED
20101219152252.429|20101219152253.857|CCO|    FOR CHILDREN UNDER 18.
20101219152253.857|20101219152255.286|CCO|DO NOT TAKE PRISTIQ WITH MAOIS.
20101219152255.286|20101219152256.714|CCO|         TAKING PRISTIQ
20101219152256.714|20101219152258.143|CCO|   WITH NSAID PAIN RELIEVERS,
20101219152258.143|20101219152259.571|CCO|  ASPIRIN, OR BLOOD THINNERS
20101219152259.571|20101219152301.000|CCO|  MAY INCREASE BLEEDING RISK.
20101219152301.000|20101219152302.250|CCO|        TELL YOUR DOCTOR
20101219152302.250|20101219152303.500|CCO|  ABOUT ALL YOUR MEDICATIONS,
20101219152303.500|20101219152304.750|CCO| INCLUDING THOSE FOR MIGRAINE,
